name: Escape Code (Lexington)
description:
After visiting an escape room I was surprised there wasn't a simple way to set up the same scenarios at home.

Played Coop

1st player will create a series clues, hints, questions, riddles or puzzles based on whatever they like

2nd will attempt to beat those puzzles in the time allowed

You can also play remotely as a quiz or generic puzzle game by sending the save_game files located in ~:/User/Appdata/Local/Escape

Puzzle data is not human readable so you can send it in confidence they won't cheat.

Code Limits: 8 characters, English Letters, Numbers

Hide codes behind family photos

Put that funco pop collection to actual use

Make a puzzle of your own home!

Update 1: 

  • Removed jarring sound at the start of the game 
  • Added option to disable sounds entirely. 
  • Fixed back button in editor returning to the main menu
